HOME.ENCRYPTED_PROTECTED_BY: Yakavharirwa, yakachengetedzwa uye yakadzivirirwa neStellar Security
HOME.WITHOUT_TRACE_DESCRIPTION: Tinovimbisa kuchengetedzwa kwakasimba kwe ruzivo rwako rwakavanzika. Dhata yose iri kuve yakavharirwa kumutengi. Hatizive IP yako, chii chawakatumira, kana kuti kune ani wawakatumira zvinongedzo zvezvakatemwa - uye zvakanyanya, zvemukati.
HOME.PRIVACY_PROTECTED_DESCRIPTION: Iwe ndiwe chete anoziva chinongedzo kune ruzivo rwakavanzika rwaunogadzira uye kuti wawakatumira nani. Paunogadzira chakavanzika, unogona kuwedzera password pamberi pekuti chisunungurwe. Zvakare, zvinogoneka kumisa nguva yekupisa. Chero zvazvingava, chakavanzika chichapfuurwa mushure mezuva makumi mana nemana.
HOME.END_TO_END_ENCRYPTED_DESCRIPTION: Zvinongedzo zvese nezvinyorwa zvakashandurwa kumutengi, zvinoreva kuti kunyange isu hatizivi chinongedzo uye zvemukati. Chimwe nechimwe chinongedzo chine ID yakasarudzika yehurefu hwe36 iyo iri encryption imwe nzira kuti uwane Chinyorwa Chakavanzika uye zvemukati chakatemwa neAES-256.
HOME.STEP_1_TITLE: Nyora meseji yako uye / kana kugadzira password
HOME.SHARE_ENCRYPTED_BY: Yakavharirwa, yakachengetedzwa uye yakadzivirirwa neStellar Security
HOME.SHARE_TEXTAREA_PLACEHOLDER: Nyora meseji yako Yakavanzika, password kana ruzivo rwakavanzika *
HOME.SHARE_EMPTY: Siyai isina chinhu kana isiri kushandiswa.

VIEW.INSTRUCTION: Nyora uye tumira meseji, ichave yakapfuurwa kana yaverengwa.
VIEW.DOWNLOAD_MESSAGE: Dhawunirodha Stellar Secret pa mobile, gadzira meseji yako yakavanzika
